name: Linko
overview: Linko is a Mastermind variant for the Commodore 64. It was developed vy Visual Delight (consisting of Roland Hermans on cod, Hermans and Willy Voesten, and Joachim Wijnhoven on music/SFX) the game was published in GO64! 2002/05. However, unlike most Mastermind variants, you play for money, as a type of "game show" against either the computer, or a second player. The game is playable in three different languages: English, German, and Dutch.
